base_description: Blue and white angular sunglasses with sleek design.
part_description: Two blue lenses, two white arms; angular lenses, straight arms.
internal_interaction_description: The blue lenses are connected to the white arms, allowing them to fold at the hinges. The arms are designed to hold the lenses in position, providing structural stability and support for the lenses when worn.
external_interaction_description: The sunglasses are worn on the face, with the arms resting on the ears and the lenses positioned in front of the eyes to provide shade and protection from sunlight. They interact with light by reducing glare and filtering UV rays.
